content: are you a newer knitter and want to make your first beanie do you just want a plain go-to beanie for multiple sizes or how about a beanie pattern where you can get creative and play with stripes colourwork or texture then this is the pattern for you this beanie features * multiple sizes - prem baby to xl adult * knit flat or in the round * short cuff or long and folded * knit the body longer before decreasing for a slouchy beanie * knit plain stripes colourwork textures - get creative **sizes ** prem 0-3 6-9 12-18 child adult xl adult **to fit head ** 30 35 40 45 50 55 61cm **yarn ** any 8ply yarn **quantity ** between 40m - 220m depending on size pompom cuff etc **needles ** 4mm straight for flat version and 4mm circulars or dpn s to work in the round and for crown shaping **notions ** stitch marker yarn needle for sewing in ends we love to see what you make make a ravelry project for your beanie or tag your project on instagram using #makermakerstore
